solution_line_template: Alyssa and Abigail collected a total of {alyssa_collected} + {abigail_collected} = <<{alyssa_collected}+{abigail_collected}={total_collected}>>{total_collected} empty cans as of today.
So, they still need to collect {required_total} - {total_collected} = <<{required_total}-{total_collected}={still_needed}>>{still_needed} more empty cans.
